    "# Getting Started\n",
    "Tprstats is designed to make Python's open-source stats ecosystem accessible to non-programmers by prioritizing:\n",
    "- Simple, consistent syntax. You don’t have to worry about learning the majority of Python’s syntax.\n",
    "- Built-in guardrails. tprstats handles constructing models with sensible default settings. "
   ]
  }

   "name": "python"
